name: Legend of Kentra
description:
Join a new group of friends as they adventure through the lands to stop an evil mage who has been summoning demons and plotting to take over the world. You will face many different foes and even meet new friends along the way.  Find new weapons and equipment through buying them in towns, rewards as quests, or even dropped from enemies. A relatively short story, mostly straight-forward questline with optional side-quests (highly recommended).

This is my first game ever developed and released. Please enjoy and have fun. Possible updates and fixes in the future.
